original_text: And he spread it before me; and it was written within and without: and there was written therein lamentations, and mourning, and woe.
korean_text: 그가 그것을 내 앞에 펴시니 그 안팎에 글이 있는데 그 위에 애가와 애곡과 재앙의 말이 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: And he spread it before me;
and it was written within and without:
and there was written therein lamentations,
